ygData.subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Help needed from players of ALL servers!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm, same thing happening in UO, where the local kakis are split amg diff shards.  Imagine we maintain a list of all local online RPGer and all go to the SAME
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm, same thing happening in UO, where the local kakis are split amg diff
shards. Imagine we maintain a list of all local online RPGer and all go to
the SAME server when a new game is out, hehe, the force will be unstoppable
;)

UO2 anyone? ;P

Ziltus Planeswalker (EQ Innoruuk)
Dark Flame (UO Baja)
Ziltus (D2 USwest)
